basics.name: Paulo Strobel Silva
basics.label: CFD Engineer & Multiphysics Researcher
basics.summary: Mechanical engineer with Ph.D. from Cranfield University and 10+ years experience in CFD and thermal analysis. Extensive expertise in data center cooling optimization, HVAC systems, multiphysics and rotor simulations. Proven track record of delivering energy-efficient solutions through advanced CFD modeling and analysis.

Implementing advanced numerical methods for complex multiphase flows in HPC environments
Supervised 7 MSc students in multiple CFD cases

work.name: Freelance

Provided detailed technical reports for equipment layout optimization and energy savings
